00103 // SingleWayThroughGroups inline definitions
00105 
00107 // method that treat each neuron of all the groups (group by group, can be twice treatment if redondant between groups)
00108 template <class OutputOperation, class FileWrapper>
00109 void SingleWayThroughGroups::iterate(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop
00110                                      , OutputOperation * const output_operation
00111                                      , FileWrapper * const file_wrapper)
00112 {
00113     for (GroupListType::const_iterator i = group_list_.begin();
00114             i != group_list_.end();
00115             ++i) {
00116         for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j = (*i)->list_.begin();
00117                 j != (*i)->list_.end();
00118                 ++j)
00119             // call the operation function to treat the spike time list
00120             output_operation->template operation<FileWrapper>(t_start, t_stop, (*j).operator->(), file_wrapper);
00121     }
00122 
00123     // separation
00124     file_wrapper->insert_separation("end_output");
00125 }
00126 
00128 // Go through the list of groups to output the IDs of the neurons or of the connections (pre- and post-neurons)
00129 template <class OutputOperation, class FileWrapper>
00130 void SingleWayThroughGroups::export_ID(OutputOperation * const output_operation
00131                                        , FileWrapper * const file_wrapper)
00132 {
00133     for (GroupListType::const_iterator i = group_list_.begin();
00134             i != group_list_.end();
00135             ++i) {
00136         for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j = (*i)->list_.begin();
00137                 j != (*i)->list_.end();
00138                 ++j)
00139             // call the operation function to treat the spike time list
00140             output_operation->export_connectivity((*j).operator->(), file_wrapper, 0);
00141     }
00142     file_wrapper->insert_separation("end_output");
00143     for (GroupListType::const_iterator i = group_list_.begin();
00144             i != group_list_.end();
00145             ++i) {
00146         for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j = (*i)->list_.begin();
00147                 j != (*i)->list_.end();
00148                 ++j)
00149             // call the operation function to treat the spike time list
00150             output_operation->export_connectivity((*j).operator->(), file_wrapper, 1);
00151     }
00152     file_wrapper->insert_separation("end_output");
00153 }
00154 
00156 // send the number of neurons in all the groups to file_wrapper
00157 template <class OutputOperation, class FileWrapper>
00158 void SingleWayThroughGroups::send_info_to_file_wrapper(OutputOperation * const output_operation, FileWrapper * const file_wrapper)
00159 {
00160     Size count = 0;
00161     for (GroupListType::const_iterator i = group_list_.begin();
00162             i != group_list_.end();
00163             ++i)
00164         for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j = (*i)->list_.begin();
00165                 j != (*i)->list_.end();
00166                 ++j)
00167             count += output_operation->nb_outputs_for_neuron((*j).operator->());
00168     file_wrapper->info_from_neuron_handler(count);
00169 }

00182 // method that treat each pair of neurons over all the groups
00183 // group after group, can be twice treatment if redondant between groups
00184 // including self-pairs
00185 template <class OutputOperation, class FileWrapper>
00186 void AllCrossPairsThroughSameGroups::iterate(const Time & t_start, const Time & t_stop
00187         , OutputOperation * const output_operation
00188         , FileWrapper * const file_wrapper)
00189 {
00190     DataRecordNeuronVisitor vis1, vis2;
00191     for (GroupListType::const_iterator i1 = group_list_.begin();
00192             i1 != group_list_.end();
00193             ++i1)
00194         for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j1 = (*i1)->list_.begin();
00195                 j1 != (*i1)->list_.end();
00196                 ++j1) {
00197             (*j1)->apply_visitor(vis1);
00198             for (GroupListType::const_iterator i2 = group_list_.begin();
00199                     i2 != group_list_.end();
00200                     ++i2)
00201                 for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j2 = (*i2)->list_.begin();
00202                         j2 != (*i2)->list_.end();
00203                         ++j2) {
00204                     (*j2)->apply_visitor(vis2);
00205                     output_operation->template operation<FileWrapper>(t_start, t_stop, vis1.spike_time_list(), vis2.spike_time_list(), file_wrapper);
00206                     vis2.reset();
00207                 }
00208             vis1.reset();
00209         }
00210 
00211     // separation
00212     file_wrapper->insert_separation("end_output");
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00217 // send the number of neurons in all the groups (twice) to file_wrapper
00218 template <class OutputOperation, class FileWrapper>
00219 void AllCrossPairsThroughSameGroups::send_info_to_file_wrapper(OutputOperation * const output_operation, FileWrapper * const file_wrapper)
00220 {
00221     Size count = 0;
00222     for (GroupListType::const_iterator i1 = group_list_.begin();
00223             i1 != group_list_.end();
00224             ++i1)
00225         for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j1 = (*i1)->list_.begin();
00226                 j1 != (*i1)->list_.end();
00227                 ++j1) {
00228             for (GroupListType::const_iterator i2 = group_list_.begin();
00229                     i2 != group_list_.end();
00230                     ++i2)
00231                 for (Group::ListNrnType::const_iterator j2 = (*i2)->list_.begin();
00232                         j2 != (*i2)->list_.end();
00233                         ++j2)
00234                     count += output_operation->nb_outputs_for_pair(*j1, *j2);
00235         }
00236     file_wrapper->info_from_neuron_handler(count);
00237 }
